committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy Production and Regulation

official_title: A bill to provide for the extension of certain hydroelectric projects located in the State of West Virginia.

summary.text: Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon request of a certain licensee, to extend the time required to commence construction of specified hydroelectric projects located in West Virginia until October 3, 1999. Instructs the Commission to reinstate any expired license for such projects and extend the time required for commencement of construction until October 3, 1999.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the extension of certain hydroelectric projects located in the State of West Virginia.
